test.telegram_body: This is a test notification from CronBox for workspace {workspace_name}.
test.email_body: This is a test notification from CronBox for workspace {workspace_name}.
test.email_success: If you received this email, your email notifications are working correctly.
test.webhook_message: This is a test notification from CronBox
test.max_body: This is a test notification from CronBox for workspace {workspace_name}.

verification.subject: [CronBox] Email Verification
verification.body: Thank you for registering. To verify your email, please click the link below:
verification.validity: The link is valid for 24 hours.
verification.ignore_notice: If you did not request this email, please ignore it.

verification_resend.subject: [CronBox] Email Verification
verification_resend.title: Email Verification
verification_resend.body: To verify your email, please click the link below:
verification_resend.validity: The link is valid for 24 hours. If you did not request this email, please ignore it.

password_reset.subject: [CronBox] Password Reset
password_reset.title: Password Reset
password_reset.body: You requested a password reset for your CronBox account.
password_reset.instruction: To set a new password, please click the link below:
password_reset.validity: The link is valid for 1 hour. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.

otp.subject: [CronBox] Login Code
otp.title: Login Code
otp.validity: The code is valid for {minutes} minutes.
otp.ignore_notice: If you did not request this code, please ignore this email.

start.greeting: üëã Hello! I'm the CronBox bot. üÜî Your Chat ID: {chat_id} Copy this ID and paste it in CronBox notification settings ‚Üí Telegram. I will send you notifications about task executions.

help.title: üìñ CronBox Bot Help How to enable notifications: 1. Copy your Chat ID (/start command) 2. Paste it in CronBox ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Notifications ‚Üí Telegram Notifications: You will receive notifications about: ‚Ä¢ Failed task executions ‚Ä¢ Task recovery after errors ‚Ä¢ Successful executions (if enabled) üåê cronbox.ru

start.greeting: üëã Hello! I'm the CronBox bot. üÜî Your Chat ID: {chat_id} Copy this ID and paste it in CronBox notification settings ‚Üí MAX. I will send you notifications about task executions.

heartbeat.late: Heartbeat monitor '{name}' has not received a ping within the expected interval. Last ping: {last_ping}
heartbeat.dead: Heartbeat monitor '{name}' is DEAD - no pings received for {missed_count} consecutive intervals. Last ping: {last_ping}
heartbeat.recovery: Heartbeat monitor '{name}' has recovered and is now healthy

process_monitor.missed_start: Process monitor '{name}' did not receive start signal. Expected at: {expected_time}
process_monitor.missed_end: Process monitor '{name}' started but did not complete within {timeout}. Started at: {start_time}

errors.cron_task_limit: Cron task limit reached. Your plan allows {max_tasks} cron task(s)
errors.cron_interval_too_frequent: Cron interval too frequent. Your plan requires minimum {min_interval} minute(s) between runs
errors.delayed_task_limit: Delayed task limit reached. Your plan allows {max_tasks} delayed task(s)
errors.requires_scheduling: This plan change requires scheduling. Use /schedule-plan-change endpoint.
errors.no_scheduling_required: This plan change does not require scheduling. Use /subscribe endpoint.
errors.no_scheduled_change: No scheduled plan change to cancel
errors.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Allowed: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
errors.file_too_large: File too large. Maximum size is 2 MB
errors.workspace_limit_reached: Workspace limit reached. Your plan allows {max_workspaces} workspace(s)
errors.worker_limit_reached: Worker limit reached. Your plan allows {max_workers} worker(s)
errors.retry_not_available: Retry on failure is not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.overlap_prevention_not_available: Overlap prevention is not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.cannot_copy_task_with_retry: Cannot copy task with retry settings. Retry on failure is not available on your plan.
errors.cannot_copy_task_with_overlap: Cannot copy task with overlap prevention settings. This feature is not available on your plan.
errors.telegram_notifications_not_available: Telegram notifications are not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.email_notifications_not_available: Email notifications are not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.webhook_notifications_not_available: Webhook notifications are not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.max_notifications_not_available: MAX notifications are not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.chain_variable_substitution_not_availabl: Variable substitution in chains is not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.task_chain_limit: Task chain limit reached. Your plan allows {max_chains} chain(s)
errors.task_chains_not_available: Task chains are not available on your plan. Please upgrade to use this feature.
errors.chain_steps_limit: Chain steps limit reached. Your plan allows {max_steps} step(s) per chain
errors.chain_interval_too_frequent: Chain interval too frequent. Your plan requires minimum {min_interval} minute(s) between runs
errors.cannot_run_chain_no_steps: Cannot run chain with no steps
errors.chain_run_rate_limited: Chain run rate limited. Your plan requires minimum {min_interval} minute(s) between runs
errors.process_monitor_limit: Process monitor limit reached. Your plan allows {max_monitors} process monitor(s)
errors.process_monitor_interval_too_short: Process monitor interval too short. Your plan requires minimum {min_interval} minute(s)
errors.process_monitor_already_running: Process is already running. Cannot accept another start signal.
errors.process_monitor_not_running: Process is not running. Cannot accept end signal.
